description: Tesla’s troubled electric pickup is illegal in Europe, yet somehow a barely modified model has found a way to get licensed. A group of European transport organizations claim this ride could spell disaster.
title: A Rubberized Cybertruck Is Ploughing Through European Pedestrian Safety Rules

description: Global Intelligence claims its Cybercheck technology can help cops find key evidence to nail a case. But a WIRED investigation reveals the smoking gun often appears far less solid.
title: It Seemed Like an AI Crime-Fighting Super Tool. Then Defense Attorneys Started Asking Questions
